      • downloadFile

        public static void downloadFile(java.lang.String url,
                                java.io.File destination)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Download a file from internet
        Parameters:
        url - Direct location to download the file
        destination - File to save the downloaded file
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if is not connected to internet
        java.io.IOException - if the URL cannot be opened
        java.io.IOException - if the destination is a directory
        java.io.IOException - if the destination file cannot be written
        java.io.IOException - if the destination file needs creating but can't be
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs during copying

        Returns:

      • indexOf

        public static int indexOf(java.lang.Object[] array,
                          java.lang.Object objectToFind)
        Finds the index of the given object in the array starting at 0.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to search through for the object, maybe be null
        objectToFind - the object to find, may be null
        Returns:
        the index of the object within the array starting at the index, -1 if not found or null array input

      • indexOf

        public static int indexOf(java.lang.Object[] array,
                          java.lang.Object objectToFind,
                          int startIndex)
        Finds the index of the given object in the array starting at the given index. A negative startIndex is treated as zero. A startIndex larger than the array length will return -1.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to search through for the object, may be null
        objectToFind - the object to find, may be null
        startIndex - the index to start searching at
        Returns:
        the index of the object within the array starting at the index, -1 if not found or null array input

      • getDigest

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getDigest(java.lang.String algorithm)
                                             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Gets the MessageDigest for the given algorithm
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm to use
        Returns:
        the MessageDigest for the given algorithm
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if no Provider supports a MessageDigestSpi implementation for the specified algorithm

      • generateFileChecksum

        public static java.lang.String generateFileChecksum(java.security.MessageDigest digest,
                                                    java.io.File file)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Validates the File Checksum using the given checksum algorithm
        Parameters:
        digest - the MessageDigest to use in order to generate the checksum
        file - the file to use and generate the checksum
        Returns:
        the generated checksum
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • hasClass

        public static boolean hasClass(java.lang.String className)
        Checks if the given class exists
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise.
